#summary &ograve character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesO

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesO O] > &ograve

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ograve;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d2/index.htm U+000D2].
  * `&Ograve` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d2/index.htm U+000D2].
  * `&ograve;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f2/index.htm U+000F2].
  * `&ograve` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f2/index.htm U+000F2].
